snippet: Facing a lawsuit over violence on board its trains heading to the United States border, a railroad is no longer turning a blind eye to migrant stowaways.
abstract: Hundreds of Central American migrants trying to make their way to the United States have reportedly been stranded in Mexico after the freight-train line they ride, labeled the Beast, began enforcing a long-ignored ban on stowaways; many of the migrants have ended up in already crowded shelters, which are reporting populations swelling beyond capacity.
lead_paragraph: Facing a lawsuit over violence on board its trains heading to the United States border, a railroad is no longer turning a blind eye to migrant stowaways.

headline.main: Stowaways Are Stranded in Mexico by Train Ban
